title: Shriram Transport Finance Company Ltd gains for third straight session - Business Standard
content: Shriram Transport Finance Company Ltd gains for third straight session  Business Standard
description: Shriram Transport Finance Company Ltd is quoting at Rs 1267.65, up 1.81% on the day as on 12:54 IST on the NSE. The stock is down 12.05% in last one year as compared to a 16.04% jump in NIFTY and a 7.44% jump in the Nifty Financial Services index.
